actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of September 5, 1962, to authorize the acquisition of land for the Edison National Historic Site in the State of New Jersey.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase lands for addition to the Edison National Historic Site, New Jersey. Authorizes the appropriation of specified sums for such land acquisition and for site development.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of September 5, 1962, to authorize the acquisition of land for the Edison National Historic Site in the State of New Jersey.
